name: Order Domain
description: Clerics of the Order domain uphold law and rightful authority.

1.name: Bonus Proficiencies
1.description: Gain proficiency with heavy armor and in either Intimidation or Persuasion.

1.name: Voice of Authority
1.description: When you cast a spell on an ally using a spell slot, that ally can use its reaction to make one weapon attack.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Order's Demand
2.description: Present your holy symbol to charm creatures of your choice within 30 feet, and you can make them drop what they are holding.

6.name: Embodiment of the Law
6.description: You can cast an enchantment spell of 1st level or higher as a bonus action. Uses equal to your Wisdom modifier per long rest.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns, deal an extra 1d8 psychic damage on a weapon attack (2d8 at 14th level).

17.name: Order's Wrath
17.description: When you deal Divine Strike damage to a creature, you can curse it. The next ally to hit it deals an extra 2d8 psychic damage and the curse ends.

choices.name: Order Domain Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Order Domain subclass
